33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Musa narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"Indeed after you there will be days in which knowledge shall be raised up and Al-Harj shall abound." They said: "O Messenger of Allah(s.a.w)! What is Al-Harj?" He said: "Killing

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْهَرْجِ وَالْعِبَادَةِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Al-Harj(And Performing Worship During It)
